q: a gaming console Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer was recently interviewed by USA Today. As usual, Steve Ballmer had some interesting things to say; here are what we consider the top three questions and answers: Q: You sold 8 million Kinects over the holidays, more than you expected. What differentiates it from other gaming consoles on the market? A: Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment center. It's a place to socialize. It's a place to watch TV.
